Title: Nil Battey Sannata
Writer: Nitesh Tiwari (story), Ashwiny Iyer Tiwari (screenplay & dialogue), Neeraj Singh (screenplay & dialogue), Pranjal Choudhary (screenplay & dialogue), Nitesh Tiwari (screenplay & dialogue)
Actors: Swara Bhaskar, Ratna Pathak Shah, Riya Shukla, Pankaj Tripathi
Plot: A story about a single women (a Mom) and dreams on her Daughter.
